Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Two Scherzi, D 593

1817

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 9' 30"

  • 1. B-flat major
  • 2. D-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/4 · BA 5525 · Klavierstücke I · ed. David Goldberger
  • Associated Board · Nine Short Piano Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Henle · HN 444 · Klavierstücke / Klaviervariationen · ed. Gertraut Haberkamp
  • Henle · HN 489 · ed. Gertraut Haberkamp
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50294 · Die drei Scherzi für Klavier · ed. Joachen Reutter

1. B-flat major

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. D-flat major

The trio is an alternative version of the trio to the sonata in E-flat major (D 568).

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2.5
